TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtectedConfigurationProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class ProtectedConfigurationProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 為基底類別，用來建立提供者，以加密和解密受保護的組態資料。

span.span: Is the base class to create providers for encrypting and decrypting protected-configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以加密組態檔來保護您的應用程式所使用的敏感資訊的區段。You can encrypt sections of a configuration file to protect sensitive information used by your application. 這可以改善安全性就不容易未經授權存取即使攻擊者取得組態檔的存取權。This improves security by making it difficult for unauthorized access even if an attacker gains access to your configuration file. .NET Framework 包含兩個受保護的組態提供者，可以用來加密組態檔的區段。The .NET Framework includes two protected configuration providers that can be used to encrypt sections of a configuration file. 類別會使用來加密組態區段。The class uses the to encrypt configuration sections. 類別會使用 Windows 資料保護 API (DPAPI) 來加密組態區段。The class uses the Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI) to encrypt configuration sections. 您可能需要使用 RSA 或 DPAPI 的提供者以外的演算法的重要資訊加密。You might have a requirement to encrypt sensitive information using an algorithm other than the RSA or DPAPI providers. 在此情況下，您可以建立您自己自訂的受保護的組態提供者。In this case, you can build your own custom protected-configuration provider. 是您必須建立自己的受保護的組態提供者繼承自抽象基底類別。The is an abstract base class that you must inherit from to create your own protected-configuration provider. 無論您是使用標準或自訂提供者，您必須確定它已設定使用`add`中的項目`providers`區段`configProtectedData`組態區段。Whether you use a standard or a custom provider, you must ensure that it is configured with the `add` element in the `providers` section of the `configProtectedData` configuration section. （請參閱下一個範例。）(See next example.) 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作受保護的組態提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865)。For details, see [Implementing a Protected Configuration Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865). > [!NOTE] > 當 ASP.NET 遇到加密的組態資料時，它會執行解密以透明的方式使用設定的提供者。When ASP.NET encounters encrypted configuration data, it performs decryption transparently using the configured provider. 您除了確定您設定必要的提供者不需要任何動作。No action is required on your side other than making sure that you configure the required provider. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作自訂。The following example shows how to implement a custom . 若要能夠將設定此提供者中的下一個組態摘要所示，您必須安裝在全域組件快取 (GAC) 中。To be able to configure this provider, as shown in the next configuration excerpt, you must install it in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC). 請參閱[實作受保護的組態提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865)如需詳細資訊。Refer to [Implementing a Protected Configuration Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/afc329e4-ef37-4915-b419-b37c745d2865) for more information. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/ProtectedConfigurationProviderLib.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/ProtectedConfigurationProviderLib.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用先前的自訂。The following example shows how to use the previous custom . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/ProtectedConfigurationProvider.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.UsingProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/ProtectedConfigurationProvider.vb#11)] 以下是摘錄自上述範例所使用的組態檔。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the above examples. ``` ```
